title: Anton Meier Ebsen J√∏rgensen ‚Äì Collaboration & Services
description: Collaboration and services: Student assistant/RA, data analysis, modeling, Excel/VBA teaching.

hero.title: Collaboration & Services
hero.text: I primarily take on student/part-time tasks, student assistant roles, and research assistant tasks within data, economics, and models ‚Äî as well as Excel/VBA teaching.

items.title: 1) Data Analysis & Econometric Tasks
items.description: Data cleaning, descriptive analysis, regression/econometrics, time series, and robustness checks.

items.title: 2) Modeling (Macro/Structural)
items.description: Working with economic models (e.g., CGE/RBC), calibration, scenarios, and quality checks.

items.title: 3) Excel/VBA Teaching & Materials
items.description: Practical cases, clear workflows, and ‚Äúfrom problem to solution‚Äù ‚Äî including templates and exercises.

faq.title: Can you share code/data from projects?
faq.text: Some projects are public (GitHub). Others cannot be shared due to coursework/confidentiality. I can often share ‚Äúsanitized‚Äù examples or a simplified demo.

boundaries.title: Tasks I typically decline
points: ‚Ä¢ Unclear requirements (‚Äúwe don't know what we want, but we need it tomorrow‚Äù)
‚Ä¢ Unreasonable deadlines without room for quality/robustness
‚Ä¢ Tasks without data access or ability to verify sources
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúJust make a model without assumptions‚Äù (that doesn't exist üòÑ)

faq.title: Remote/hybrid?
faq.text: Yes ‚Äî Copenhagen based, but hybrid/remote depends on the task and data security.

contact.title: Let's have a chat
contact.text: Please write briefly: (1) what you want to achieve, (2) what type of data/theme, (3) time horizon, and (4) expected scope.
